name: Get The Glass Out Of The Plastic Bin!!!
name_original: Get The Glass Out Of The Plastic Bin!!!
description: This game was made in one week for the Easy Jam hosted by 8 Bits to Infinity, I'm fifteen and this is my first game jam/ first official game. It is a simple game where you sort random pieces of recycling into various recycling bins in an attempt to get as high a score as possible before time runs out. There is also an endless mode where you can sort for as long as you like without a time restraint.
